about_the_game:
Kaiju Fury Turbo is a top-down, couch co-op, non-stop, action adventure, set in a world where one military technology company has made its mission to defeat, capture, and contain kaiju. As a kaiju, battle your way out from under military control, destroy defense hardened cities, defeat captured kaiju, and become the cataclysm they always feared.



Game Features:

Dynamic Combat System: Master a variety of attacks as you control the kaiju – dash to evade, unleash melee and strong melee blows, fire ranged attacks like devastating fireballs, or bring down the wrath with your Ultimate attack.

Progress and Evolve: As you devastate cities, unlock new kaiju characters and abilities. Each kaiju has unique abilities, allowing for diverse strategies and playstyles.

Team Up and Conquer: Dive into 4-player co-op multiplayer action. While you can rampage solo, Kaiju Fury Turbo is designed for fun and mayhem with friends. The game scales dynamically, increasing the challenge and fun when you play with others.

Epic Boss Battles: Face off against formidable bosses that require teamwork and strategy to defeat. As you progress, the enemies grow tougher and the bosses more cunning.

Destruction at Your Fingertips: Feel the satisfaction as you lay waste to entire cities. Buildings crumble at the power of your massive attacks!



Gather your friends, choose your monster, and start the rampage today! Become the cataclysm they always feared in Kaiju Fury Turbo.
